title: Completion Web 3 Graphic Design Asssets
description: We’re launching a Web3 project and need a freelancer to create standout design assets that capture our brand’s futuristic, decentralized ethos. This includes logos, banners, social media kits, and token/NFT visuals that feel authentic to Web3 culture while remaining polished and versatile. The right designer will help us stand out in a crowded space with a bold visual identity that scales across platforms.

milestones.title: Phase 1 – Concept & Style Guide
milestones.description: Collaborate with our team to understand brand values, audience, and aesthetic direction. Deliver moodboards, style frames, and an adaptable design system aligned with Web3 culture.

milestones.title: Phase 2 – Core Asset Creation
milestones.description: Produce essential design assets including logo variations, banners, icons, NFT/token visuals, and social media templates, ensuring consistency and adaptability across digital channels.

milestones.title: Phase 3 – Launch Package & Iteration
milestones.description: Assemble a ready-to-use asset library with export formats optimized for multiple platforms, and refine based on early community feedback. Provide ongoing support for launch campaigns and potential partnerships.
